home-page.hero-section-title: We Help You to be a job-ready tech talent
home-page.hero-section-sub-title: Start your career in tech industry as web programmer or mobile developer
home-page.about-us-section-description: Hammercode is tech community initiated as a place for learner, programmer, developer, and the other tech industry players at Palu and surrounding areas. Our activities orienting to knowledge-transfer which is expected to accelerate the distribution of skills in industry and to produce ready to work technology talents
home-page.program-section-1-description: Our community members from various tech company ready to help you with internship or full-time job application.
home-page.program-section-2-description: Classes and workshops are available for various fields, such as the web, mobile apps to data. The level of presented material varies, from beginner to advanced.
home-page.program-section-3-description: Monthly knowledge sharing activities brought by practitioner from industry and community members.
home-page.impact-section-sub-title: Some Friends Who Feel the Benefits
home-page.contact-us-section-title: Got any question or just want casual chit-chat?
home-page.contact-us-section-description: We will love to be connected with you. Just hit the button below ;)
home-page.mentor-section-sub-title: Take opportunity to learn from experienced tech practitioners from various tech companies

about-us-page.background-section-description: The need for quality technology talent continues to grow. Sadly the skills gap possessed by IT graduates from universities and industry needs is still pretty large. Java and Sumatra got lots of top-level universities with more advanced industry and community ecosystems than other areas, especially Palu, Central Celebes.
about-us-page.history-section-description: Hammercode was initiated at 2017 by some people who already works in technology industry
about-us-page.impact-section-description: Hammercode has reached xxx local talent. But unfortunately, still only few who make it into the world of work. Some of our member :
